import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Ecom} from './Ecom' export default class Login extends Component { handleSubmit = async (e) => { ; e.preventDefault(); var frm = new FormData(document.getElementById('loginForm')); e.preventDefault(); const req = await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/auth/login', { "method": "POST", "body": frm }) let res = await req.json(); this.setCookie('session-member-record', JSON.stringify(res), 10); var data = JSON.parse(this.getCookie('session-member-record')); console.log(data); } render() { return ( <>
